categories.name: find
categories.description: A benchmark for determining a specific set bit in a mixed set of bits, typically the first set bit in the sequence of bits.

categories.name: count
categories.description: A benchmark for determining the number of set bits in a sequence of bits bixed to be 1 and 0.

categories.name: is_sorted_until
categories.description: A benchmark checking for determinining whether a sequence of bits is, up to a certain point in the sequence of bits.

categories.name: is_sorted
categories.description: A benchmark checking for determinining whether a sequence of bits is assorted.
